comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Heh -- as kids, whenever one of us was sick ... and had a sore throat, we would be soothed (treated) with a teaspoon of Karo syrup. I don't remember it ever being used for anything else -- but mom probably used it in cooking ;-) (It wasn't until I was an adult -- and shopping on my own -- that I saw it came in both "Light" and "Dark" versions ... I only knew of the "Light" variety). (To learn about the history of Karo -- from 1902 to present -- go here.)
